memberdef.name: DG_TO_ROS_IMPL
memberdef.initializer: template <> \ inline void converter(DgToRos<T>::ros_t& dst, const DgToRos<T>::dg_t& src)

memberdef.name: ROS_TO_DG_IMPL
memberdef.initializer: template <> \ inline void converter(DgToRos<T>::dg_t& dst, const DgToRos<T>::ros_t& src)

memberdef.name: DG_BRIDGE_TO_ROS_MAKE_STAMPED_IMPL
memberdef.initializer: template <> \ inline void converter(DgToRos<std::pair<T, Vector> >::ros_t& dst, \ const DgToRos<std::pair<T, Vector> >::dg_t& src) \ { \ makeHeader(dst.header); \ converter<DgToRos<T>::ros_t, DgToRos<T>::dg_t>(dst.ATTRIBUTE, src); \ do \ { \ EXTRA \ } while (0); \ } \ struct e_n_d__w_i_t_h__s_e_m_i_c_o_l_o_n

briefdescription.para: This macro generates a converter for a stamped type from dynamic-graph to ROS.

detaileddescription.para: I.e. A data associated with its timestamp.

memberdef.name: DG_BRIDGE_MAKE_SHPTR_IMPL
memberdef.initializer: template <> \ inline void converter( \ DgToRos<T>::dg_t& dst, \ const boost::shared_ptr<DgToRos<T>::ros_t const>& src) \ { \ converter<DgToRos<T>::dg_t, DgToRos<T>::ros_t>(dst, *src); \ } \ struct e_n_d__w_i_t_h__s_e_m_i_c_o_l_o_n

briefdescription.para: This macro generates a converter for a shared pointer on a ROS type to a dynamic-graph type.

detaileddescription.para: A converter for the underlying type is required. I.e. to convert a shared_ptr<T> to T', a converter from T to T' is required.

memberdef.name: DG_BRIDGE_MAKE_STAMPED_IMPL
memberdef.initializer: template <> \ inline void converter(DgToRos<std::pair<T, Vector> >::dg_t& dst, \ const DgToRos<std::pair<T, Vector> >::ros_t& src) \ { \ converter<DgToRos<T>::dg_t, DgToRos<T>::ros_t>(dst, src.ATTRIBUTE); \ do \ { \ EXTRA \ } while (0); \ } \ struct e_n_d__w_i_t_h__s_e_m_i_c_o_l_o_n

briefdescription.para: This macro generates a converter for a stamped type.

detaileddescription.para: I.e. A data associated with its timestamp.
FIXME: the timestamp is not yet forwarded to the dg signal.

memberdef.name: DG_BRIDGE_MAKE_STAMPED_SHPTR_IMPL
memberdef.initializer: template <> \ inline void converter( \ DgToRos<std::pair<T, Vector> >::dg_t& dst, \ const boost::shared_ptr<DgToRos<std::pair<T, Vector> >::ros_t const>& \ src) \ { \ converter<DgToRos<T>::dg_t, DgToRos<T>::ros_t>(dst, src->ATTRIBUTE); \ do \ { \ EXTRA \ } while (0); \ } \ struct e_n_d__w_i_t_h__s_e_m_i_c_o_l_o_n

briefdescription.para: This macro generates a converter for a shared pointer on a stamped type.

detaileddescription.para: I.e. A data associated with its timestamp.
FIXME: the timestamp is not yet forwarded to the dg signal.
